about-1: This exhibition presents the life and struggles of General Sudirman through meaningful works of art. From his youth as a humble yet dignified commander, to his guerrilla struggle amidst illness to defend the nation's independence, each painting invites us to trace his footsteps. Behind every stroke of color lies a fighting spirit, courage, and a timeless example.
about-2: Through this exhibition, we want to invite the younger generation to learn more about General Sudirman's values ​​of patriotism, courage, and fortitude. Art not only serves as a silent witness to history, but also bridges the message of struggle so that it lives on in all our hearts. May his spirit continue to inspire, ignite hope, and serve as a reminder that love for one's country is always relevant today and in the future.
